name: Find Differences Scandinavia
description:
Amazing find differences quiz for people willing to discover new countries & territories.

Scandinavia or Nordics consists of Denmark, Finland, Iceland, Norway and Sweden, including the associated territories of Greenland, the Faroe Islands and the Åland Islands.

Around 27 Mio people living on 3,5 Mio km2 in 8 states and territories speaking 14 different languages with one of the highests GDP worldwide of $ 54.000 per capita.

Search for differences in the best Find Differences Scandinavia amazing puzzle game for free.

Compare two images, search and find differences. Get hints for fast difference detection.

- 200 beautiful HD images
- 5 differences per level
- no time limit
- Online and offline
- Use zoom for better search and to find challenging differences
- 3 hints per level
- Play on your smartphone or tablet
- Relaxing music.

Find the difference puzzle game is the best way to have fun when you're bored!

Are you addicted to finding the differences but out of hints?
Find the difference detectives and experts can earn credits to replenish their hints.
How many credits can you earn with your eagle eyes?
Try to find the difference without hints or help.

Challenge your friends and invite them to play Find Differences Scandinavia too - for free!

Have questions, suggestions or simply love the best Find Differences Scandinavia puzzle game for adults and kids, please leave a review and tell us about it.

Find Differences Scandinavia puzzle game is similar to hidden objects game.

Find Differences Scandinavia is counting on you!
